member.name: DML_INPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC
member.summary: Describes a connection within a graph of DirectML operators defined by and passed to . This structure is used to define a connection from a graph input to an input of an internal node.

member.name: DML_INPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.GraphInputIndex
member.summary: The index of the graph input from which a connection to an internal node input is specified.

member.name: DML_INPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.ToNodeIndex
member.summary: The index of the internal node onto which the connection from the graph input is specified.

member.name: DML_INPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.ToNodeInputIndex
member.summary: The index of the input on the internal node where the connection is specified.

member.name: DML_INPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.Name
member.summary: An optional name for the graph connection. If provided, this might be used within certain error messages emitted by the DirectML debug layer.
